title: Sleeping Hobos in a Tent, Rush 'Em!
description:
Bob Garfield and Mike Vuolo discuss the early 20th-century origins of a bizarre food-industry code with lexicographer Ben Zimmer.
Lexicon Valley is brought to you by The Message, an original science fiction podcast from Panoply and GE Podcast Theater.
